thread.title: Kenya: Teachers Are Well Paid, Says MP Nyokabi
thread.title_full: Kenya: Teachers Are Well Paid, Says MP Nyokabi

title: Kenya: Teachers Are Well Paid, Says MP Nyokabi
text:
Kenya: Govt Opens Bids for Supply of Controversial School Laptops Again By Wambugu Kanyi 
Nyeri woman representative Priscilla Nyokabi has said teachers will earn more than other civil servants if the 50-60 per cent pay rise is paid. 
Speaking at ACK St Peter's in Nyeri town on Sunday, she said they should be humble and resume duty because the government is funding other projects such as infrastructure, health and security as well. 
"For many years, the teachers were earning less than other civil servants but now it has greatly improved. They should thank the government," Nyokabi said. Kenya
